Loops
```{r}
spped <- 64

while (spped > 30){
  print("Slow down!")
  spped <- spped - 7
  
}

spped

```

```{r}
speed <- 64

while (speed > 30){
  print(paste("Your speed is: ", speed))
  
  if(speed >= 48){
    print("Slow down big time!")
    speed <- speed -11
  }else{
    print("Slow down!")
    speed <- speed -6
  }
  
}

speed


```


```{r}
linkedin <- c(16,9,13,5,2,17,14)
for(l in linkedin){
  print(l)
}

for(i in l:length(linkedin)) {
  print(linkedin[i])
}
```

loop over a list
```{r}
nyc <- list(pop=8405837, boroughs=c("Manhattan","Bronx","Brooklyn","Queens","Staten island"), capital=FALSE)

for (n in nyc) {
  print(n)
  
}

for(i in 1:length(nyc)){
  if (i==2){
    for (j in 1:length(nyc[[i]])) {
      print(nyc[[i]][j])
    }
    else{
      print(nyc[[i]])
      }
  }
}

```
```{r}

views <- matrix(c(linkedin,facebook), nrow=2, byrow = TRUE)

for(row in 1:nrow(views)){
  for(col in 1:ncol(views)){
    print(paste("on row", row, "and column", col, "contains", views[row][col]))
  }
}
  


```
